data.md:MetaData: Mass balance of Stubacher Sonnblickkees, Hohe Tauern Range, Eastern Alps, Austria
Massenhaushaltswerte vom Stubacher Sonnblickkees für die Jahre 1971/72 bis 1977/78

Results of the direct, glaciological determination of the mass budget of Stubacher Sonnblick kees in the Hohe Tauern group are summarized for the years 1971/72 through 1977/78. Tabulation of budget quantities, accumulation and ablation areas and distribution of budget terms for 50 m altitude intervals is supplemented by comments on observations and field work.

Time coverage | Coverage | Accumulation area | Sc | Mass balance in accumulation area | Bc | Ablation area | Sa | Mass balance in ablation area | Ba | Total area | S | Mass balance, total | B | Specific mass balance | b | Sc/S | Accumulation area ratio | AAR | Calculated | Sc/Sa | Date/time end | Area extent | Area | Percentage | Perc | Altschneefläche Sc | Firnfläche | Eisfläche | Elevation, maximum | Elev max | Elevation, minimum | Elev min | delta S | b delta S | Mass | end of budget year
